name: Sneaky Santa (levi6707)
description:
This is a game we are working on and this is the GitHub link Santa-clicker

We are working on it for unity the full game will probly be publish on https://gamejolt.com/@Crazygames1_5361/games

Controls:

Click on Santa's house or {SPACE} to make presents

Click on Santa or {G} to make Santa delver presents

Click The black down arrow or {Down Arrow} to see the houses

Click The up arrow or {UP} To go back to the north pole

Press Left or Right when Locking at the houses to move
